title: Inner Peace: Wisdom from Jean Pierre de Caussade
description: How do I find peace of mind in my stressed-out life? Caussade tells us not to fret over the past, nor worry about the future because God is at work for our good in the midst of every duty and every event. Jean-Pierre de Caussade was a Jesuit priest best-known as the author of Abandonment to Divine Providence.
author: Jean-Pierre de Caussade
